alert.note: Alert for Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 02 at 6:07PM CST until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL WOODRUFF AND SOUTHEASTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 606 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Pryor, or 11 miles north of Des Arc, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Pryor... Hurricane Lake WMA... Worden... Georgetown... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
